thread.title: Trump's latest hustle: 'The Art of the Kneel'
thread.title_full: Trump's latest hustle: 'The Art of the Kneel'

author: Manage Account
title: Trump's latest hustle: 'The Art of the Kneel'
text:
Editor: The moment I learned of the good news that Donald Trump was making available the Holy Bible with his own personal endorsement, I made a beeline to the nearest mall to buy a copy before the multitudes of his followers swept the stores clean. After all, how could The Donald miss? He demonstrated his powers of persuasion with his "The Art of the Deal."
[]
Submissions now open for the 2024 Mother's day edition.
